page.title: 03ALVES PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Alves Primary School, situated in the west end of the small village of Alves, consists of two separate buildings.One being the main teaching block and the other being the hall and kitchen.Primary 3 to 7 are taught in a semi_open plan area, which has a library,a G.P. room and a remedial area adjoining.Primary 1 and 2 are taught at the opposite end of the building.Across the corridoor from them the Playgroup meets.Surrounding the buildings is a large tarmac playground.Adjoining this there is a playing field with a full size football pitch and a sand pit for long jump.The school was a Junior Secondary and as the roll has dropped in the last few years there is plenty of room. Officially it can accommodate 150 pupils.
